surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
lit. right and wrong, crooked and straight (idiom); fig. merits and demerits/pros and cons

sentences.english: They are disputing about the rights and wrongs of the case.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在激烈争论这个事件的是非曲直。
救助艇的最大工作负荷是非曲直14KN。

definition: lit. right and wrong, crooked and straight (idiom); fig. merits and demerits/pros and cons

severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
